ErrorCode.name: PropertySetInitValue
ErrorCode.description: Error setting the intial value of the property

ErrorCode.name: CanNotSetValue
ErrorCode.description: Problem to set value of the property

ErrorCode.name: CanNotGetValue
ErrorCode.description: Problem to get value of the property

ErrorCode.name: InvokeActionError
ErrorCode.description: Error in invokeAction which performs asynchronous calls

ErrorCode.name: ArchiveMonitorProblem
ErrorCode.description: Archive monitor could not archive a value of a property.

ErrorCode.name: DisableAlarmsError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Failed to disable propagation of Property Alarms
ErrorCode.description: Failed to disable the propagation of Property Alarms to the ACS Alarm System because an alarm is already raised.
